channel.title: Ancient Curses
channel.description:
Hello, I've been trying to add ancient curses using asshole_rule's tutorial. I've done fine with every other part but this one piece of code give me 100 errors: [code]if(c.curseActive[18]) { // Asshole_rule if(c.oldPlayerIndex > 0 && Server.playerHandler.players[c.oldPlayerIndex] != null) { try { final int pX = c.getX(); final int pY = c.getY(); final int nX = Server.playerHandler.players[i].getX(); final int nY = Server.playerHandler.players[i].getY(); final int offX = (pY - nY)* -1; final int offY = (pX - nX)* -1; c.getPA().createPlayersProjectile2(pX, pY, offX, offY, 50, 50, 2263, 9, 9, - c.oldPlayerIndex - 1, 24, 0); EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { public void execute(EventContainer b) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[c.oldPlayerIndex] != null) Server.playerHandler.players[c.oldPlayerIndex].gfx0(2264); // 1738 b.stop(); } }, 500); EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { // CAUSES CRASH public void execute(EventContainer b) { c.getPA().createPlayersProjectile2(nX, nY, offX, offY, 50, 50, 2263, 9, 9, - c.playerId - 1, 24, 0); b.stop(); } }, 800); } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); } } }[/code]
Here is the 100 error message I get: [code] ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2549: class, interface, or enum ex pected for (int j = 0; j < prayerData.length; j++) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2552: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.usingPrayer = true; ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2553: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2554: class, interface, or enum ex pected for (int j = 0; j < curseData.length; j++) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2554: class, interface, or enum ex pected for (int j = 0; j < curseData.length; j++) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2557: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.usingPrayer = true; ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2558: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2563: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2565: class, interface, or enum ex pected if (c.prayerPoint <= 0) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2567: class, interface, or enum ex pected reducePrayerLevel(); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2568: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2572: class, interface, or enum ex pected public void reducePrayerLevel() { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2575: class, interface, or enum ex pected } else { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2577: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.playerLevel[5] = 0; ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2578: class, interface, or enum ex pected resetPrayers(); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2579: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.prayerId = -1; ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2580: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2582: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2584: class, interface, or enum ex pected public void resetPrayers() { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2585: class, interface, or enum ex pected for(int i = 0; i < c.prayerActive.length; i++) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2585: class, interface, or enum ex pected for(int i = 0; i < c.prayerActive.length; i++) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2587: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.getPA().sendFrame36(c.PRAYER_GLOW[i], 0); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2588: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2590: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.getPA().requestUpdates(); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2591: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2597: class, interface, or enum ex pected public boolean checkReqs() { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2600: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2603: class, interface, or enum ex pected if (c.inPits && Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex].inPi ts) ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2605: class, interface, or enum ex pected if(Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex].inDuelArena() && c.duelStatus != 5 && !c.usingMagic) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2608: class, interface, or enum ex pected return false; ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2609: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2611: class, interface, or enum ex pected return false; ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2612: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2616: class, interface, or enum ex pected } else { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2618: class, interface, or enum ex pected return false; ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2619: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2623: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.stopMovement(); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2624: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack(); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2625: class, interface, or enum ex pected return false; ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2626: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2630: class, interface, or enum ex pected if(combatDif1 > c.wildLevel || combatDif1 > Server.playe rHandler.players[c.playerIndex].wildLevel) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2632: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.stopMovement(); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2633: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack(); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2634: class, interface, or enum ex pected return false; ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2635: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2641: class, interface, or enum ex pected if(combatDif1 > c.wildLevel || combatDif1 > Server.playe rHandler.players[c.playerIndex].wildLevel) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2643: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.stopMovement(); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2644: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack(); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2645: class, interface, or enum ex pected return false; ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2646: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2651: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.stopMovement(); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2652: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack(); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2653: class, interface, or enum ex pected return false; ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2654: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2657: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.stopMovement(); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2658: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack(); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2659: class, interface, or enum ex pected return false; ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2660: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2663: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.stopMovement(); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2664: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack(); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2665: class, interface, or enum ex pected return false; ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2666: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2669: class, interface, or enum ex pected if(combatDif1 > c.wildLevel || combatDif1 > Server.playe rHandler.players[c.playerIndex].wildLevel) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2671: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.stopMovement(); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2672: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack(); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2673: class, interface, or enum ex pected return false; ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2674: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2681: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.stopMovement(); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2682: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack(); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2683: class, interface, or enum ex pected return false; ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2684: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2687: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.stopMovement(); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:2688: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack(); ^ 100 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
If anyone could help that would be great.. And if you need a copy of my combatassistant.java just ask and I'd be happy to give it to you. Thank you:)

item.title: Ancient Curses
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:

item.title: Ancient Curses
item.dc:creator: @xldarkwinglx xldarkwinglx
item.description:
@xldarkwinglx wrote:

I think its in here.

double[] prayerData = { 1, // Thick Skin. 1, // Burst of Strength. 1, // Clarity of Thought. 1, // Sharp Eye. 1, // Mystic Will. 2, // Rock Skin. 2, // SuperHuman Strength. 2, // Improved Reflexes. 0.4, // Rapid restore. 0.6, // Rapid Heal. 0.6, // Protect Items. 1.5, // Hawk eye. 2, // Mystic Lore. 4, // Steel Skin. 4, // Ultimate Strength. 4, // Incredible Reflexes. 4, // Protect from Magic. 4, // Protect from Missiles. 4, // Protect from Melee. 4, // Eagle Eye. 4, // Mystic Might. 1, // Retribution. 2, // Redemption. 6, // Smite. double[] curseData = { 0.6, // Protect Item 2, // Sap Warrior 2, // Sap Range 2, // Sap Mage 2, // Sap Spirit 1, // Berserker 4, // Deflect Summoning 4, // Deflect Mage 4, // Deflect Range 4, // Deflect Melee 4, // Leech Attack 4, // Leech Range 4, // Leech Mage 4, // Leech Defence 4, // Leech Strength 4, // Leech Energy 4, // Leech Special 4, // Wrath 8, // Soul Split 10, // Turmoil }; }; };

See that last };. Delete it and try that. If it give the same error put it back.
